text: Drigo is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Paola Drigo (1876-1938), Italian short story writer and novelist *Riccardo Drigo (1846–1930), Italian composer of ballet music and Italian opera, theatrical conductor and pianist ** The Talisman (ballet), a ballet in 4 Acts and 7 Scenes, with choreography by Marius Petipa ** Swan Lake (1895) (or 1917 Petipa/Ivanov/Drigo), a revival of Swan Lake, famous version of the ballet Swan Lake
title: Drigo
